data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Crespo, Francisco Antonio, Valverde, Alejandra Del Carmen, Iglesias, Mónica Sandra (2015): A new species of Tribonium Saussure, 1862 from the Province of Misiones, Argentina (Blattaria, Blaberidae, Zetoborinae). Zootaxa 3936 (4): 593-599, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3936.4.9
